requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A new visitor interested in exploring stock data.
user_goal: To verify that the frontend loads dynamic content from backend APIs without using hardcoded data.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the website and expects to see dynamic content loaded via API calls rather than static placeholders.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page renders dynamically with no hard-coded data, confirming API integrations are functioning properly.

requirement_tested: A backend application connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_goal: To ensure the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Jordan starts the backend server expecting it to connect to PostgreSQL using correct environment variables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes successfully and logs indicate successful connection to the PostgreSQL database at localhost:5432.

requirement_tested: A search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: An investor looking up stock performance quickly.
user_goal: To search for a specific stock by entering its code or name.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Code
narrative_steps.description: Sam enters 'AAPL' into the search bar hoping to find Apple Inc.'s stock information.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'AAPL' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Input updates dynamically without triggering a search yet.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Query
narrative_steps.description: After typing, Sam presses Enter to submit the query.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System sends a request to the backend API and begins fetching data about AAPL stock.

requirement_tested: A feature to select report formats and content options
user_persona: A financial analyst preparing customized reports.
user_goal: To tailor the report format and included sections according to personal preference.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Report Format
narrative_steps.description: Taylor wants the report in PDF format and checks the corresponding checkbox.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'PDF' checkbox under 'Report Format'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Checkbox changes to checked state indicating selection.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Content Sections
narrative_steps.description: Taylor selects 'Basic Info' and 'Market Trends' to be included in the report.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Basic Info' and 'Market Trends' checkboxes under 'Content Sections'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both checkboxes update to checked states reflecting chosen content sections.

requirement_tested: Automated generation of customized stock reports based on user selections
user_persona: A portfolio manager needing quick insights.
user_goal: To generate a customized stock report based on previously selected preferences.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Report Generation
narrative_steps.description: Morgan has filled out the search and customization fields and now clicks the Generate Report button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Request is sent to backend API with selected parameters and report generation begins.

requirement_tested: Display of basic stock information in generated reports
user_goal: To review essential stock metadata within the generated report.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Generated Report
narrative_steps.description: Casey views the newly generated report and looks for basic stock information first.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the generated report page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Section titled 'Basic Stock Information' displays accurate details like symbol, company name, sector, industry, and exchange.

requirement_tested: Inclusion of market trends data in stock reports
user_goal: To visualize market trends in the generated report.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Market Trends Section
narrative_steps.description: Riley scrolls down the report looking for graphical representation of market trends.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the 'Market Trends' section of the report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive chart showing historical price/volume trends is displayed correctly.

requirement_tested: Inclusion of financial data in stock reports
user_goal: To analyze financial statements presented in the report.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Financial Tables
narrative_steps.description: Drew focuses on the financial health of the company by checking the financial data table.
narrative_steps.action: Locate and read the 'Financial Data' table in the report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table shows quarterly/yearly financial metrics such as revenue, net income, and EPS accurately.

requirement_tested: White background color applied throughout the website
user_goal: To confirm the entire site maintains a uniform white background.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Site Background
narrative_steps.description: Jamie navigates through different pages to check if backgrounds remain consistently white.
narrative_steps.action: Visit multiple pages including home, search results, and report viewer.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every page and component area shows a solid white background as defined in global styles.

requirement_tested: Navy color applied to all components
user_persona: A UI/UX specialist verifying color theme compliance.
user_goal: To validate that all components use navy as their primary accent color.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Component Styling
narrative_steps.description: Taylor inspects various UI elements like buttons, forms, and text labels across the app.
narrative_steps.action: Observe styling of buttons, input borders, icons, and headings.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive and static components utilize navy for text color, borders, and icons consistently.

requirement_tested: A homepage introducing the stock report generation service
user_persona: A potential user visiting the site for the first time.
user_goal: To understand the purpose of the service from the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Introduction
narrative_steps.description: Jordan lands on the homepage and reads the introductory paragraph to learn about the service.
narrative_steps.action: Read the hero section and description text.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clear messaging explains how the platform works and invites further exploration.

requirement_tested: A results page displaying generated stock reports
user_persona: A consultant presenting findings to clients.
user_goal: To access and present a finalized stock report.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Results Page
narrative_steps.description: Alex waits for the report generation to finish and then navigates to the results page.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for completion and navigate to the report result view.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Well-formatted report with all requested sections appears in a scrollable card layout.

requirement_tested: Responsive design compatible with desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A busy executive accessing the tool remotely.
user_goal: To seamlessly interact with the site on both desktop and mobile.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Mobile Layout
narrative_steps.description: Robin resizes browser window to simulate mobile device usage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively, stacking elements vertically and optimizing touch targets for small screens.

requirement_tested: Loading indicators during data fetching and report generation processes
user_persona: A user waiting for slow network responses.
user_goal: To receive feedback while the system processes requests.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Loading State
narrative_steps.description: Patience searches for a stock known to take longer to load data.
narrative_steps.action: Perform search and wait for response.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Loading spinner overlays main content until data arrives, keeping user informed of ongoing activity.

requirement_tested: Error handling for invalid stock codes or unavailable data
user_persona: A tester evaluating robustness of error scenarios.
user_goal: To observe how the system handles incorrect inputs gracefully.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Invalid Stock Code
narrative_steps.description: Tester intentionally submits an invalid stock code to trigger error handling.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline red-colored error message appears stating 'Invalid stock symbol' beneath the search bar.
